description____0___multiline: This programme equips students with the skills required to design and develop modern, interactive web interfaces. Emphasis is placed on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and the latest front-end frameworks, ensuring graduates can build responsive and user-friendly applications.Students will engage in practical projects, collaborative development exercises, and real-world scenarios to gain hands-on experience, preparing them for professional roles in web development.
learning_outcomes____0___multiline: Graduates will be able to implement complex user interfaces, optimize web performance, and ensure cross-browser compatibility. They will also understand web accessibility standards and best practices for front-end architecture.Additionally, students will demonstrate the ability to work in agile teams, use version control systems effectively, and continuously learn emerging front-end technologies to maintain competitive skills in the industry.

description____0___multiline: This programme focuses on the server-side of web applications, covering topics such as databases, server scripting, application architecture, and API development. Students will learn to build robust, secure, and scalable back-end systems.Hands-on exercises, project-based learning, and exposure to industry-standard tools provide practical experience in deploying and managing server-side applications in real-world environments.
learning_outcomes____0___multiline: Graduates will be able to design and implement databases, develop RESTful APIs, and integrate with front-end systems efficiently. They will also understand security, authentication, and performance optimization techniques.Furthermore, students will develop problem-solving skills, work with development frameworks, and apply best practices in software engineering to maintain high-quality, maintainable back-end code.
